name: Simipour
author: nagimiso
flavor_text: It prefers places with clean water. When its tuft runs low, it replenishes it by siphoning up water with its tail.

abilities.name: Monkey Trio
abilities.effect: If you have Simisage, Simisear, and Simipour in play, ignore all {C} Energy in the costs of attacks used by this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Liquid Lashing
attacks.effect: This attack also does 30 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
